name: The Way Home (cameronhgamedev)
description:
Play as someone who's lost themselves as they explore a void and an abstract world in a search for themselves and their own personal meaning of home.

This game is an interactive fiction developed in Twine, with a couple paths branching into bad endings, and one main path leading to a true, good ending.

CREDITS:

Everything in game by Cameron R. Home (The Great Empire Corporation)
